page.title: 10GARFORTH LIBRARY
page.content: {Garforth Library}has{26,OOO books.}It is on the corner of{MAIN STREET}and{ {CHURCH LANE.}There are 5 full time and l half time staff. Garforth Library was opened on the l9th February l969 by LADY CLEGG J.P. Chairman of the County Liberal Committee because previously there was no library in Garforth. Each member has two tickets but you can request more. For each ticket you can have one book. When you have chosen your books the attendant stamps a small piece of paper in each cover. The date stamped is the date you must bring your book back by. If you do not return your book by this date you get a fine. After the attendant has stamped your book she takes an indexing card containing the book's name and slots it in your ticket. The library is divided into adults and childrens sections.
